review: Very inconsistent device.  It'll work for awhile, then constantly interrupt to load...  I workaround the problem by grabbing an older roku unit (LT or HD) from another TV and using it to to watch the rest of video.  The older units work solid, this one is intermittent (I connect older units to same input, across same access point--the problem is specific to the 3500R).  Good luck with yours--hope your experience is better than mine.
